name: Xml Test Suite
short_description:
XmlTestSuite helps with the testing of complex web applications.
  • Tests are written in XML
  • Supports test driven development
  • Separate page structure, data from test steps
  • Test HTML, databases, javascript, xpath
Uses HttpUnit
